title: British Airways sale: New York, Miami and Bangkok in 2016 from £361 return
text:
In August, British Airways kicked off their annual Take Off sale with a number of European and international flights down to half price, including the U.S, Australia and Spain.
Since launching the mega-deals, they've added 1,000 more last minute holiday packages, down to £200 or less , including four-star breaks in Dalaman and Portugal where temperatures are still in the 25-degrees region this time of year.
In addition to their Take Off deals, BA has added more reductions to six of their most popular destinations - including New York and Bangkok. Flights are down to £361 per person return - you can view the best deals below.
For even cheaper flights to the US, see our guide on WOW airs' cheapest EVER £99 flights to New York from London via Iceland.
3 best British Airways packages under £200 Dalaman : Seven-nights at the 4-star Orsmaris Butik, from £191 per person , travelling October 14 – 21 2015. Includes World Traveller return flights from Gatwick and accommodation, including breakfast.
Faro : Seven-nights at the 4-star Quinta Pedra, from £159 per person , travelling November 9 - 16 2015. Includes Euro Traveller return flights from Gatwick and accommodation.
Amsterdam : Two-nights at the 4-star Best Western Blue Square, from £119 per person , travelling November 1 - 3 2015. Includes Euro Traveller return flights from Gatwick and accommodation.
British Airways sale on six: NYC, Boston and Cape Town Take a look at the full list of sale on six destinations below. The sale ends 29 September 2015.
New York: From 15 April – 25 May 2016 and 6 June – 21 June 2016. Fly from £361 return
Bangkok: From 15 April - 16 June 2016. Fly from £475 return
Singapore: From 15 April - 15 June 2016. Fly from £455 return
Miami: From 15 April - 25 May 2016 and 6 June - 21 June 21 2016. Fly from £439 return
Boston: From 15 April - 25 May 25 2016 and 6 June - 21 June 2016. Fly from £369 return
Cape Town: From 15 October - 7 December 7 2015. Fly from £799 return
Customers can book online at www.ba.com . British Airways flights include free online check-in and in-flight refreshments.
For more holiday tips and savings, see our guide on how to book an all inclusive holiday .

If you're after a last minute 2015 break, here's our pick of the best late BA deals this week. For even more late deals, see our holidays page .
Rome - Two nights at the 4* Sunrise Hotel, from £89 per person , travelling November 1 - November 30 2015. Includes Euro Traveller return flights from Gatwick and accommodation with breakfast. Book by October 03 2015.
Tenerife - Seven nights at the 4* Diverhotel Tenerife Spa & Gardens, from £219 per person , travelling November 1 - November 30 2015. Includes return flights from Gatwick and accommodation with breakfast. Book by October 03 2015.
Boston - Three nights at the 2.5* Midtown, from £429 per person , travelling November 1 - November 30 2015. Includes World Traveller return flights from Heathrow and accommodation. Book by September 29 2015.
Orlando - Seven nights at the 3* Ramada Hotel Gateway, from £499 per person , travelling November 1 - December 10 2015. Includes return flights from Gatwick and accommodation. Book by September 29 2015.
Dubai - Three nights at the 5* Hyatt Regency Dubai and Galleria, from £529 per person , travelling on selected dates in October 2015. Includes return flights from London Heathrow and accommodation with breakfast. 20% hotel saving included. Book by September 29 2015.
